title: Escaping mobs, uncertain futures, no way home: Manipur students who fled to Delhi | Manipur Violence
selftext:
This is painful to hear, being a student it is even more distressing. Hearing their experience reminded me of Jamia incident in 2020 during CAA protests. 

Every parent, or soon to be married or new parent should watch this. This is what hate will do to your child, it will either turn them into a mob attacking a girl hostel at night or your child will be the victim of this mob. Either way your children's future is grim. We might google which region of the country is safest for my child to do higher study but worry not your beloved prime time hate mongers will come to each and every part of this country. 

Ignore the rant, please watch the video.
